template: Welcome to [[facility.name]], [[tenant.first_name]]! I'm [[bot.name]] and I'm here to help you. Text me any time with any questions you have, and I'll do my best to answer you!
Thank you for renting with [[facility.name]]. We hope you had a wonderful experience. Feel free to text me in the future if you ever need to rent a storage unit again!
Your move-in date is scheduled for [[tenant.move_in_date]]. We'll see you soon!
Of course! Right now we have sizes [[facility.unit_sizes_available]] available. Which size would you like?
Perfect. What day would you like to move in?
Great. I've reserved a 5x10 unit for you. Your move-in day is set for May 1. We'll see you soon!

trigger: do you have any available units
can i transfer to another unit

template: Hmm. You don't have a move-out scheduled. Would you like me to have the manager give you a call?
